mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS (USER_ID, EMAIL, PASSWORD, USER_NAME, ADDRESS, PHONE_NUMBER, ROLE) VALUES ('USER' || LPAD((SELECT NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(USER_ID, 5))) + 1, 1) FROM USERS), 4, '0'), #{email}, #{password}, #{userName}, #{address}, #{phoneNumber}, #{role})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM USERS WHERE EMAIL = #{email} AND PASSWORD = #{password}
